rules_text:
Wayfarer [i](If you’ve spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} this turn, discover L’Or.)[/i]
{T}: Untap target land you control. If you’ve discovered L’Or, you may have that land become a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
